text:
In honor of #WorldImmunizationWeek, @Pharmacy_Times interviewed Nurisha Wade, MBA and @FarahTowfic, PharmD, MBA, of @USPharmacopeia on USP’s COVID-19 #Vaccine Handling Toolkit and how it can be used by #pharmacists to support #COVID19 #immunizations.
 https://t.co/phZhl0zdSk https://t.co/oTHOzTiyxq
